overview: In this North western, a brave Canadian Mountie pursuing a gang of fur thieves finds himself drummed out of the RCMP and forced to run a gauntlet of Mountie whips. When the gang learns of this, they convince him to join them.
tagline: SWIFT TERROR......bitter revenge...heroic deeds...in the untamed northland...where women are of the same tough fibre as the men they love!
title: North of the Yukon
